Name: Ümmügülsüm
description:
Ümmügülsüm was born in 1980 in Karaman and she has one child. She has been engaged in cattle breeding for a long time. She also cultivates mushrooms to earn additional income.

With the microcredit support she hopes to receive through Kiva, Ümmügülsüm wants to buy an air conditioner for the room which she uses to cultivate mushrooms. This way, she plans to grow mushrooms all year long.
